html:
Jan 28 (Reuters) - Abrdn Plc ABDN.L:

  • RESULT OF SECONDARY PLACING

  • SECONDARY PLACING IN PHOENIX GROUP HOLDINGS PLC RAISING AGGREGATE GROSS SALE PROCEEDS OF APPROXIMATELY £264 MILLION.

  • ABRDN ANNOUNCES IT HAS SOLD 39,981,442 ORDINARY SHARES OF ITS SHAREHOLDING IN PHOENIX GROUP HOLDINGS PLC PHNX.L FOR £264 MILLION

Source text for Eikon: (Full Story)

Further company coverage: ABDN.L


(Reporting by Emma-Victoria Farr)
